ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Rebreather pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: I have had mine priced at 3k for singles and steadily decreasing prices from there for multiples.  I have one guild possibly ordering 18, and quoted them a
ygData.messageBody:
I have had mine priced at 3k for singles and steadily decreasing prices
from there for multiples. I have one guild possibly ordering 18, and
quoted them a price of 33k.(<2k each). The problem with selling them to
the public, is that fishbones sell for around 3k on E'ci, and most people
do not want to give up whatever their headslot item is. The weight is a
HUGE concern for casters. I will be glad when we can finally make
something that is useful to the general public.

I had thought the powergloves would be a good seller, but again, it is
not, being gnome only shot that down in a heartbeat. Is anyone else
confused as to why they didn't make them like the rest of the armors
seem to be.....small race. Monks would love gnomish power gloves,
as would most clerics, rogues, and some of the warriors I know. I had
one guy offer me 500pp for a pair before he found out that they were
gnome only. =(

Ghirardelli
Master Tinkerer
E'ci
